ComicInfo.Title: Cracked Business Cards!; The Day We Have Our First Female President; TV Protest Buttons; Up-Dated Mechanical Banks; Cheeter, Tarzin's Faithful Chimp!; Take the Cracked History Test; The World's First Psychedelic Janitor; The Pick-Up; Cracked's Think Tank Solutions; The Cracked Guide for High Living without Working; Goryson's Gorillas!
ComicInfo.Summary: British editions are identical to the US editions except for the price and cover date. The UK numbering includes Cracked Collectors' Editions.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev36 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-04-05 17:41:17. [Issue ID 250432]
ComicInfo.Penciller: Tony Tallarico,Charlie Rodrigues,Bill Ward,John Severin,John Langton
ComicInfo.Inker: Tony Tallarico,Charlie Rodrigues,Bill Ward,John Severin,John Langton
